name: The Enchanted Forest
description: A short branching adventure through a mysterious forest. Multiple paths lead to different endings.

content.data: You stand at the entrance of an ancient forest. The trees tower above you, their canopy filtering the sunlight into dancing patterns on the moss-covered ground. A worn signpost stands before you, pointing in two directions. To the left, the path plunges into shadow beneath thick, gnarled oaks. To the right, sunlight streams through silver birches onto a meadow of wildflowers.

options.linkText: Take the dark path into the ancient oaks
Follow the sunlit path toward the meadow

content.data: The dark path winds deeper into the forest. The air grows cool and damp. Strange mushrooms glow faintly along the roots of the ancient trees. After a while, you hear two sounds: the low echo of dripping water from somewhere underground, and the distant rush of a river ahead.

options.linkText: Follow the dripping sound into the cave
Head toward the sound of the river

content.data: The bright path opens into a meadow bursting with colour. Butterflies drift between the wildflowers, and the warm sun feels wonderful on your face. Across the meadow you can see two things: a winding river with stepping stones, and a tall stone tower rising above the treeline.

options.linkText: Walk down to the river crossing

content.data: You squeeze through a narrow opening in the rock and find yourself in a vast underground cavern. Crystals embedded in the walls catch the light of the glowing mushrooms, filling the space with an ethereal blue glow. In the centre of the cavern, on a natural stone pedestal, sits an ornate wooden chest. You open it carefully. Inside, you find a beautifully crafted compass made of silver and starlight. It always points toward home. You have found the Forest's Gift. THE END.

You arrive at a wide river. The water runs clear and swift over smooth stones. A rope bridge stretches across to the far bank, swaying gently in the breeze. It looks sturdy enough, but downstream you notice a calmer section where you could swim across. The far bank is lined with willow trees, and you can see smoke rising from somewhere beyond them.

options.linkText: Swim across at the calm section

content.data: You climb the winding stairs of the stone tower. Each floor reveals arrow-slit windows offering wider views. At the top, you step onto the open platform and gasp. The entire enchanted forest stretches out before you in every direction — the dark oaks, the shining river, the distant mountains. You can see the village beyond the river, a cave entrance glimmering with blue light, and far to the north, the sea. You understand now: the forest is alive, and it welcomed you. You will never be lost again. THE END.

The rope bridge holds firm, and you cross to the far bank. Following the smell of wood smoke, you walk through the willow trees and discover a small village of cosy cottages. The villagers welcome you warmly. They are the Keepers of the Forest, and they have been expecting you. Over a meal of fresh bread and honey, they share stories of the forest's magic and invite you to stay as long as you wish. You have found a new home. THE END.

You wade into the calm section of the river. The water is refreshingly cool. As you swim across, the current carries you gently downstream. You round a bend and discover something breathtaking: a hidden waterfall cascading into a crystal pool, surrounded by ferns and flowering vines. Behind the waterfall, there is a grotto filled with the sound of singing — the river itself seems to have a voice. You sit by the pool and listen. The song fills you with peace, and you know you have found something rare and precious. THE END.
